0.2.0.desc:
The following items are now shuffled:
	Kakariko Village Street Merchant items
	Freestanding Pieces of Heart, Small Keys, and Heart Containers (models do not reflect actual items)
	Treacherous Tower (Intermediate)
	Bee Guy (Golden Bee)
	Milk Bar Owner
New settings:
	[logic]
		dont_require_lamp_for_darkness - By default, Lamp is now required for dark areas (Sanctuary, Graveyard, and Dark Palace). When set to true, this is disabled. (Default: false)
		require_golden_bee_for_sale - By default, logic allows for catching a Golden Bee with the Net to get Bee Guy's second item. When set to true, only the purchasable Golden Bee is considered in logic. (Default: false)
		unsafe_key_placement - By default, Small Keys in certain dungeons will be filled in order to prevent (most) softlocks. When set to true, allows keys to be filled in an order that can result in softlocks. (Default: false)
Final boss cutscenes are automatically skipped.
Some locations and items in spoiler log renamed for consistency.
Message in a Bottle and Premium Milk will no longer show up in inventory, but the relevant locations should still be accessible.
Fixes:
	Fixed receiving Ravio's freebie after purchasing corresponding item.
	Zelda can no longer have progression items, other than the Bow of Light.
	Obtaining Message in a Bottle while having five bottles no longer causes the message to disappear (or vice-versa).
	Excluded locations can no longer contain Bow of Light.

logic.comment: Modifications to the logic in the game.

dont_require_lamp_for_darkness.comment: Disables the lamp requirement for dark areas.

require_golden_bee_for_sale.comment: Requires the golden bee from the seller for the Bee Badge check.

unsafe_key_placement.comment: Allows keys to be placed in an order where one or more softlocks can occur.
